Enter the UCS organization path as a slash deliminated string. This activity will convert it to UCS notation. The initial 'root' is optional. Entering no value defaults the output to the root organization. For example:
Organization Path entered: Output:
/ org-root root org-root root/MyOrg org-root/org-MyOrg /MyOrg/SubOrg org-root/org-MyOrg/org-SubOrg MyOrg/SubOrg org-root/org-MyOrg/org-SubOrg
